Package org.apertereports.components

Class Summary
AperteInvokerComponent Displays a component with a list of available report templates and lets manually generate a report with temporal parameters.
CyclicReportsComponent  
HelpButton Displays an icon button with help.
HelpComponent Displays a HTML formatted label.
HelpLayout Displays a help button wrapped into an expanding layout.
HelpWindow Displays a help window with tabbed contents based on passed HelpWindow.Module and HelpWindow.Tab.
ModalWindow A simple modal window with fixed height.
PaginatedPanelList<O,W extends Panel>  
Popup  
RefreshButton Displays a button with a refresh icon.
ReportManagerComponent Component to manage reports.
ReportOrderBrowserComponent  
ReportParametersComponent Displays report parameters taken from JRXML parameters section as Vaadin fields in a form.
ReportParamPanel  
ReportPropertiesForm  
SimpleHorizontalLayout A simple horizontal layout that adds a list of components.
 

Enum Summary
HelpWindow.Module Help modules.
HelpWindow.Tab Tab names of the help content.
